project_abstract.cdata: The project would expand the Bank Group's support of ABC's (Agricultural Bank of China) medium and long-term lending for the diversification and modernization of agricultural production and processing which was initiated by the ongoing first Rural Credit Project (1462-CHA). Project subloans would be provided by ABC to individual farmers and households, collective units, and enterprises owned by local government entities and collectives in the two provinces of Fujian and Hunan to finance investments for the development of aquaculture, orchards, agroprocessing and livestock enterprises. A technical assistance component is included to effectively implement the project and to strengthen the operations of ABC. At full development, the value of the incremental output from the project would be about US$140 million p.a. The project would benefit directly some 16,000 families from increased production and incomes, and generate additional employment equivalent to 61,000 full time jobs.

P003439.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二农村信贷项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将加大世行集团对中国农业银行中长期贷款的支持力度，以实现农业生产和加工多样化和现代化。这项工作已由在建第一农村信贷项目（贷款号1462-CHA）启动。项目子贷款将由中国农业银行向福建和湖南两省的单个农户、集体单位和地方政府部门所属企业提供，用于资助水产养殖、果树种植、农产品加工和畜牧企业发展所需投资。项目设有技术援助子项目，其宗旨是推动本项目有效实施，增强中国农业银行的业务能力。项目完全展开之时，项目年度新增产值将达到1.4亿美元左右。由于产量和收入增加，项目将直接惠及1.6万农户，也将新增6.1万个长期就业岗位。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
